github_commits.author: Rahul Sharma
github_commits.message: Investigation - Initial code review and setup for performance analysis
github_commits.lessons_learned: Full table scan detected - likely due to missing indexes. Need to investigate further.
github_commits.bug_related: This commit starts the investigation into the performance issue flagged as a full table scan.  It's the first step in understanding the root cause.

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Yaar, Investigation pe kaam karna hai.  Is data-me kya problem hai?

messages.author: Priya
messages.text: Haan bhai, main dekh rahi hoon.  Rahul, tu kya dekh raha hai?

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Theek hai, let me check the code and see if there are any missing indexes.  Maybe that‚Äôs the issue?

messages.author: Neha
messages.text: Arrey, ye issue production mein aayega kya?  It's a big one!  Let's be careful.

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Nahi yaar, testing mein catch kar lenge.  Let's start with the development environment.

slack_conversations.key_decisions: Decided to start investigation with a focus on potential missing indexes.
slack_conversations.warnings: Warning: Possible full table scan detected - investigate indexes.
slack_conversations.bug_clues: Rahul mentioned 'full table scan' - needs immediate investigation into index usage.

jira_tickets.title: Implement Investigation - Performance Analysis
jira_tickets.description: Conduct a thorough investigation into the reported performance issue.  Focus on identifying potential causes such as missing indexes, inefficient queries, or data skew.  Document all findings and recommendations.
comments: Update 1: Initial investigation started - checking query logs.
Update 2: Identified potential missing index on 'users' table.
jira_tickets.bug_connection: Related to the reported 'full table scan' performance issue.

confluence_docs.title: Documentation for Investigation - Performance Issue
confluence_docs.content: This document outlines the process for investigating performance issues, specifically focusing on full table scans.  Key steps include: 1. Analyze query logs. 2. Identify slow queries. 3. Check for missing indexes. 4. Review data skew. 5. Optimize queries.
confluence_docs.author: Sneha Patel
best_practices: Always check for missing indexes before optimizing queries.
Use query profiling tools to identify slow queries.
common_mistakes: Assuming missing indexes are always the problem - investigate data skew as well.

google_docs.title: Sprint 5 Planning - Performance Investigation
google_docs.content: Meeting held on 2024-01-15 at 10:00 AM. Attendees: Rahul, Priya, Amit, Arjun.  Action items: Rahul to analyze query logs. Priya to investigate indexes. Arjun to create a Jira ticket (TECH-501).  Decision: Prioritize investigation of full table scan.
decisions_made: Prioritize investigation of full table scan.
google_docs.bug_mentions: Full table scan detected - immediate action required.
